meanings.definition: The state or quality of being inglorious.
meanings.sent1: The ingloriousness of his actions was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: Her ingloriousness in the competition was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ingloriousness at catching mice was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ingloriousness of the situation left a bitter taste in his mouth.
meanings.sent5: The ingloriousness of the defeat haunted him for days.

meanings.definition: Lack of honor or fame; dishonor.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's ingloriousness in battle was a source of shame.
meanings.sent2: The ingloriousness of his behavior tarnished his reputation.
meanings.sent3: The ingloriousness of the situation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The ingloriousness of the decision cast a shadow over their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The ingloriousness of the accusation was hard to shake off.
